abstract.para: You can install additional application packages to extend the functionality of the OTRS framework. You can install packages via the package manager in the adminarea. The package manager downloads the applications from an online repository and manages package dependencies. It is also possible to install packages from local files, in case your OTRS system does not have a direct internet connection.

sect1.title: Calendar
sect1.para: You can edit and view both private andr public user-based appointments With the web-based calendar.

sect1.title: Content manager
sect1.para: The content manager lets you edit and administrate your web projects online and via your web browser.

sect1.title: File manager
sect1.para: The file manager makes it possible to access the content of a directory that is located in the file system of the machine where OTRS is installed. You can use your web browser to upload, download, delete and view files, browse and create subdirectories, etc.

sect1.title: Web mailer
sect1.para: With the webmailer you can access your mailbox via an IMAP server. It is possible to compose new messages, answer and forward your mails, etc. simply with your web browser.

sect1.title: FAQ
sect1.para: The Knowledge Base component. It supports editing and viewing of FAQ articles. Articles can be viewed and restricted to agents, customer users or anonymous users. Articles can be structured in groups and have different languages.

sect1.title: System status
sect1.para: With the system status application the OTRS admin can give an overview of different system tasks. The output of this module is reachable through the adminarea of OTRS.
